author: ojeda
body:
This may fix completely the BoostIO -- I did not compile myself all the libraries/dependencies to verify that all link errors are gone, but compilation errors should be, plus a lot of link errors as well.

Hopefully this will be the last or second-to-last iteration to finally have a fully linked BoostIO IB with the templated code moved into the CondFormats' libraries.
title: Next set of fixes for the BoostIO
